title: Quality Improvement Initiatives
description: The Center for Medicaid and CHIP Services (CMCS) Quality Improvement (QI) Program provides state Medicaid and CHIP agencies and their quality improvement partners with the information, tools, and expert support they need to improve care and health outcomes, as demonstrated by performance on Medicaid and CHIP Child and Adult Core Set measur
cleaned_text: The Center for Medicaid and CHIP Services (CMCS) Quality Improvement (QI) Program provides state Medicaid and CHIP agencies and their quality improvement partners with the information, tools, and expert support they need to improve care and health outcomes, as demonstrated by performance on Medicaid and CHIP Child and Adult [Core Set](/medicaid/quality-of-care/quality-of-care-performance-measurement/index.html) measures. Technical assistance is available to help states build QI knowledge and skills, develop QI projects, and implement, spread and scale-up QI initiatives. Quality Improvement Areas of Focus [Maternal and Infant Health Initiative](/medicaid/quality-of-care/quality-improvement-initiatives/maternal-infant-health-care-quality/index.html) [Postpartum Care Learning Learning Collaborative](/medicaid/quality-of-care/quality-improvement-initiatives/maternal-infant-health-care-quality/Low-Risk-Cesarean-Delivery/index.html) [Foster Care Learning Collaborative](/medicaid/quality-of-care/quality-improvement-initiatives/foster-care-learning-collaborative/index.html) Care of Acute and Chronic Conditions Behavioral Health Care [Dental and Oral Health Care Initiative](/medicaid/benefits/dental-care/index.html) Long Term Services and Supports Medicaid Quality Grants
